meanings.sent1: The skookum tree stood tall in the forest, unaffected by the storm.
meanings.sent2: The skookum bridge held up even under the weight of heavy trucks.
meanings.sent3: The skookum hammer never broke, no matter how hard I swung it!
meanings.sent4: Her skookum determination carried her through the toughest times.
meanings.sent5: The skookum fortress protected the village from any danger.

meanings.sent1: The skookum fireworks display lit up the night sky with vibrant colors.
meanings.sent2: The skookum performance left the audience in awe.
meanings.sent3: His skookum magic trick amazed everyone at the party.
meanings.sent4: The skookum painting captured the beauty of the landscape perfectly.
meanings.sent5: The skookum diamond sparkled brilliantly in the sunlight.

meanings.definition: A type of large, powerful salmon found in the Pacific Northwest.
meanings.sent1: The skookum salmon leaped out of the water, glistening in the sun.
meanings.sent2: The skookum fisherman proudly displayed his catch of the day.
meanings.sent3: The skookum salmon was so big, it barely fit in the boat!
meanings.sent4: The skookum salmon swam upstream with incredible strength.
meanings.sent5: The skookum salmon was a prized catch for the local fishermen.
